chatgpt_solution:
By the properties of logarithms, this expression is equal to \begin{align*}
\log_3 81 - \log_3 \frac{1}{9} &= \log_3 3^4 - \log_3 \frac{1}{3^2} \\
&= \log_3 3^4 - (\log_3 1 - \log_3 3^2) \\
&= \log_3 3^4 - (\log_3 1 - 2\log_3 3) \\
&= \log_3 3^4 - (0-2\cdot 1) \\
&= \log_3 3^4 + 2 \\
&= \log_3 (3^2 \cdot 3^4) \\
&= \log_3 3^6 \\
&= \boxed{6}.
\end{align*}
